articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: US drops its designation of China as currency manipulator in advance of trade-pact signing
articles.description: US drops its designation of China as currency manipulator in advance of trade-pact signing
articles.content:
WASHINGTON -- 
US drops its designation of China as currency manipulator in advance of trade-pact signing.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: How major US stock indexes fared Monday
articles.description: Stocks closed broadly higher on Wall Street Monday, sending the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq to record highs
articles.content:
Stocks closed broadly higher on Wall Street Monday, sending the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq to record highs. 
Financial companies powered the rally, which came ahead of the scheduled signing of a Phase 1 trade deal between the U.S. and China on Wednesday. The… [+643 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Franklin College fires president following Wisconsin arrest
articles.description: Franklin College in Indiana has fired its president after he was arrested in Wisconsin on suspicion of using a computer to facilitate a sex crime and attempted child enticement
articles.content:
STURGEON BAY, Wis. -- 
Franklin College in Indiana has fired its president after he was arrested in Wisconsin on suspicion of using a computer to facilitate a sex crime and attempted child enticement, the school said Monday.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Detroit man cleared after nearly 30 years in prison
articles.description: A Detroit man has been cleared of assault and attempted murder after nearly 30 years in prison
articles.content:
DETROIT -- 
A judge on Monday dismissed the 1991 conviction of a man who spent nearly 30 years in prison for an attack on a Detroit woman in a car.
Gerry Thomas, who was helped by law schools in Michigan and New York, has long maintained his innocence. The … [+996 chars]

articles.title: Injured baby right whale given grim prognosis after 2nd look

articles.title: Sheriff: 2 jail inmates escape after locking up deputy
articles.description: Authorities in Colorado are looking for two inmates who escaped from a jail in a small town after overpowering a guard and locking her in a cell
articles.content:
WESTCLIFFE, Colo. -- 
Authorities in Colorado searched Monday for two inmates, including one suspected of attempted murder, who escaped from a jail in a small town after overpowering a guard and locking her in a cell.

articles.title: Baltimore sees 15 shot, 5 fatally, in warm winter weekend
articles.description: Shooting victims in violence-plagued Baltimore are already adding up in 2020
articles.content:
